title: Delinea Privilege Manager - Overview
description: The Delinea Privilege Manager Overview dashboard offers a summary of Application Control events and Local Security events.

definition.content:
Delinea Privilege Manager is an endpoint least privilege and application control solution for Windows and macOS, capable of supporting enterprises and fast-growing organizations at scale. Local Security and Application Control are the two major components of Delinea Privilege Manager.

The Delinea Privilege Manager Overview dashboard offers a summary of Application Control events and Local Security events.

For more information, see the [Delinea Privilege Manager integration documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/delinea_privilege_manager/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

Application Control Events group includes the following event types:
- Application Action Events
- Application Justification Events
- Bad Rated Application Action Events

search.query: source:delinea-privilege-manager service:(application-action-events OR application-justification-events OR bad-rated-application-action-events) $ComputerName $HostName $EventType $UserName
source:delinea-privilege-manager service:(application-action-events OR application-justification-events OR bad-rated-application-action-events) $ComputerName $HostName $EventType $UserName

definition.content:
The Local Security Events group includes the following event types:
- Password Disclosure Events
- Newly Discovered File Events
- Change History Events

search.query: source:delinea-privilege-manager service:(password-disclosure-events OR newly-discovered-file-events OR change-history-events) $ComputerName $HostName $EventType $UserName
source:delinea-privilege-manager service:(password-disclosure-events OR newly-discovered-file-events OR change-history-events) $ComputerName $HostName $EventType $UserName

query.query_string: source:delinea-privilege-manager service:(password-disclosure-events OR newly-discovered-file-events OR change-history-events) $ComputerName $HostName $EventType $UserName

definition.content: Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Delinea Privilege Manager logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals, verify that [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security) is enabled.
